column5: RGNX added some yesterday up to 82k shares now will eventually round it up to 10k and be fully invested The goal is to get as much ownership as possible here My timing hasnt been the best but this is the consolidation period When she starts to rip it will be too late to buy Not really buying for a buyout think she will do just fine on her own her time
